description._content: Image taken from: Title: "[The Poetical Works of Sir Walter Scott ... With a memoir of the author. Illustrated by many engravings, etc.]", "Collections of Works. Poetical Works" Author: Scott, Walter - Sir Contributor: Foster, Myles Birket Contributor: Gilbert, John - Sir Contributor: Lockhart, J. G. (John Gibson) Contributor: Turner, J. M. W. (Joseph Mallord William) Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 11611.g.15." Page: 10 Place of Publishing: Edinburgh Date of Publishing: 1857 Publisher: A. & C. Black Edition: [Another edition.] The Poetical Works of Sir Walter Scott ... With all his introductions, notes, various readings, and notes by J. G. Lockhart, Esq. Illustrated by numerous engravings ... after J. M. W. Turner, Birket Foster and John Gilbert. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003316936 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
